title: Someday
description: A mother's love leads to a mother's dream—every mother's dream—for her child to live life to its fullest.   A deceptively simple, powerful ode to the potential of love and the potential in life, Someday is the book you'll want to share with someone else... today. The perfect gift for Mother's Day, Graduation Day or any day—share a copy with every special person in your life.
author: Alison McGhee
